    • Uses of Task in mhs.src.storage.persistence.task

      Subclasses of Task in mhs.src.storage.persistence.task 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeadlineTask
      DeadlineTask Deadline Task Object - Inherits from base class Task
      - Task with an endDateTime
      - Syncs with google calendar
      class  FloatingTask
      FloatingTask Floating Task Object - Inherits from base class Task
      - Not synced with google calendar
      class  TimedTask
      TimedTask Timed Task object - inherits from base class Task
      - Task with startDateTime and endDateTime
      - syncs with google calendar
